children.text: O'SULLIVAN SET FOR WATERFORD AFTER CORK CITY DEPARTURE
First Division side Waterford United is the favorite to sign Mark O'Sullivan following the striker's departure from Cork City.
REAL MADRID IN TALKS WITH THIBAUT COURTOIS
Real Madrid has renewed his interest on Thibaut Courtois and is already in talks with the Belgian keeper, who contract with Chelsea runs off in 2019.
